ARABIC: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ مِن صَلْصَٰلٍ مِّنْ حَمَإٍ مَّسْنُونٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We created mankind out of dried clay formed from fetid black mud.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Man We fashioned from fermented clay dried tingling hard,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely We brought man into being out of dry ringing clay which was wrought from black mud,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We have created the human being out of pure mud-moulded clay
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed We created man from sounding clay made out of black smelly mud.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And indeed, We created man from dried (sounding) clay of altered mud.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And certainly We created man of clay that gives forth sound, of black mud fashioned in shape.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely We created man of a clay of mud moulded,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Verily We created man of potter's clay of black mud altered,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We created man out of dry clay, from moulded mud,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And assuredly We have created human being from ringing clay of loam moulded.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Certainly We created man out of a dry clay [drawn] from an aging mud,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: We created man from sounding clay, from mud moulded into shape;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And indeed, We created man from sounding clay of altered black smooth mud.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We created mankind from clay, molded from mud,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We created the human being from clay, from molded mud.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We did certainly create man out of clay from an altered black mud.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:26] And verily We created man, Adam, out of a dry [clinking] clay, that gives off a clinking sound when it is tapped, of malleable mud, black [mud].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Verily We created man) Adam (of potter's clay) of dry clay (of black mud altered) clay that stinks; it is also 274 said that this means: shaped clay.
